call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - February 12th

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Binance Integration Progress
topics.summary: Discussion of Rosen Bridge progress on Binance integration and Kraken applications. Technical update on Docker repository changes affecting Watcher and Guard software deployment, requiring new PostgreSQL repository configuration.

topics.title: Palmyra Multi-Chain Token Launch Strategy
topics.summary: Dan announces Palmyra's upcoming token launch later this month across multiple chains including Cardano, Ergo, and EVM networks. Strategy focuses on concentrated liquidity over broad distribution, with market maker support and selective exchange listings.

topics.title: Hong Kong Conference and Business Development
topics.summary: Sam will represent Palmyra at Hong Kong conference with kushti, focusing on potential fund discussions and exchange listings. Combined Palmyra-Ergo business development efforts including Lithos index development work.

topics.title: Ergo Testnet 6.0 RC2 Status
topics.summary: Update on Ergo 6.0 RC2 testnet deployment with improved block times of 16.77 seconds. Call for more testnet participants to distribute mining hash and improve testing conditions for sub-blocks functionality.

topics.title: US Crypto Regulation and Trump Administration
topics.summary: Extended discussion on US crypto policy changes under Trump administration, analyzing potential motivations behind 'American Crypto' initiatives. Dan suggests strategy to bring crypto businesses back to US for better regulatory framework development.

topics.title: Ergo's Resilience and Decentralization Philosophy
topics.summary: Discussion of Ergo's ability to survive regulatory storms due to its decentralized nature, optional privacy features, and robust open-source tooling. Emphasis on Ergo's independence from external market pressures.

topics.title: Sub-blocks Development Timeline
topics.summary: Brief update on sub-blocks development progress, with epics completed and voting done on testnet. Development is moving forward with kushti leading the implementation.

topics.title: Marketing Strategy for Non-Crypto Audiences
topics.summary: Discussion on promoting Ergo to non-crypto audiences, with emphasis on utility-first approach rather than speculation. Both speakers advocate for projects building on Ergo to handle their own marketing while foundation focuses on developer tools and grassroots adoption.

topics.title: Intellectual Property Protection in Open Source
topics.summary: Advice for developers on protecting IP while participating in Ergo's open-source ecosystem. Discussion of hybrid approaches using open-source smart contracts with closed-source UIs, emphasizing transparency and trade-offs.
